original_text: The pig's feet are in two parts. But when the pig eats its food, it does not bring the food back into its mouth. It does not eat it twice. The people must not eat the pig.
korean_text: 돼지는 굽이 갈라져 쪽발이로되 새김질을 못하므로 너희에게 부정하니

sentences.original_text: The pig's feet are in two parts.
sentences.korean_translation: 돼지의 발은 두 부분으로 되어 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: But when the pig eats its food,
it does not bring the food back into its mouth.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 먹이를 다시 입으로 가져오지 않습니다.

sentences.original_text: It does not eat it twice.
The people must not eat the pig.
